segments.text: What stresses you out the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , during school , they wanted good grades . Then after I got a job , they wanted me to get a better job . And finally , they want me to get married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have to deal with a lot of pressure from your parents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your parents are not like that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ever since I brought home some bad grades in elementary school , they never expected much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you do to deal with the stress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much I can do . It's always there . I sometimes go out with some friends and drink , but that's only a temporary solution . The stress always returns in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sucks . You wanna go grab a beer ?
segments.speaker: S1
